Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Naāhāraduka
Bāvīsaka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Naāhāraduka
Bāvīsaka
1752Naāhārapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā naanantarapaccayā nasamanantarapaccayā…pe…  nakammapaccayā navipākapaccayā najhānapaccayā namaggapaccayā nasampayuttapaccayā navippayuttapaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā indriye ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1753Naāhāramūlakaṃ.
